chara.textHome: Good to see you...
Uh...it's hot lately, isn't it?

Er, I mean, it's not that I dislike
summer or anything...
Um. What am I even saying right now?
Sorry...
I love summer mornings...
You can feel the shining rays of the sun...
Though it gets glaring by noon...
It's a little hard to bear.

I thought it was normal to write in
your diary at the end of the day...
But sometimes I open it at noon.

Writing then is different from
writing at night...yeah.
Summer sunsets are so pretty.

The other day, the sky was lit
in a burning orange...

I bought a pencil that color and
drew in my diary with it...
Oh, fireworks! I...love them...

I watch them quietly, both the big ones
and the little sparklers.
They comfort me...mhm.
D-do you ever eat shaved ice?
What flavor syrup do you like?
I...I like the clear ones.
Rika says strawberry is the best...
Um...ah...
Shouldn't we be heading out soon?
Oh!
I didn't wear this outfit to go out right away...
just so you know...yeah..

The Mirror Witch's Labyrinth is
strangely cool even in the summer.

But I get so nervous about being in
the way that I still sweat anyway...
Oh...my swimsuit?

Right. Out of the ones Rika picked out
for meâ€¦it seemed like one I might wear
...so I bought it.
H-how is it?
Wow... The ocean...
I haven't been here since I was a child.
It's so bright, and the waves sparkle.
It's prettier than I ever imagined...

I really liked the summer break homework
in grade school...

I'd draw picture diaries,
then write in my own diary...
I never got sick of it.
Oh, look!
Such a pretty shell!
Is it a...pearl oyster?

The light catches different parts
when you change angles...
I want to take it home and treasure it.

I used to hate school,
so summer break was a relief...

But now, I like summer break because
I can see my friends as much as I like.

I want to try putting all kinds of experiences
into words, like an essayist...

So I want to do something this summer
that I won't ever be able to do again...
yeah...
Wow, look at those thunderheads!
It's a small thing, but it feels kind of new.

Back when I wanted to die,
I never really enjoyed anything like this...

I want to get a lot more
colored pencils, mhm.
New friends, memories of the shining sea...

I want to record those memories with
the same colors I experienced them in.
H-huh? Ah...?
Is something wrong with my swimsuit?

D-did I wear it inside-out...?
No, there's no way!
Yeah...
